attributes.action: Force airlines and Eurostar to allow dogs, cats and other pets in cabins.
attributes.background: Force airlines and Eurostar to accept dogs, cats and pets smaller than 8kg in cabins on UK routes. Since Eurostar has a monopoly on this route, it should accept animals allowed under the Pet Passport scheme. Force airlines and ferries to report injuries, losses or deaths to animals in their care.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be an operational decision for airlines and Eurostar. You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to require all airlines and train companies operating in the UK to allow dogs and other pets in cabins.
